title: NEL service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: NEL service has resumed. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL service is delayed for both direction due to a signalling fault at Farrer Park NE8. Additional travel time of about 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL service is delayed for both direction due to a signalling fault at Farrer Park NE8. Additional travel time of about 10 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL service towards HarbourFront NE1 is delayed due to a signalling fault at Farrer Park NE8. Additional travel time of about 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
